rows.label: qst105401_msg0001
rows.name:
I have something of a special request
to ask. In particular of you, Rex.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0002
rows.name: Huh, you're asking me? Not Zeke?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0003
rows.name:
Correct. You are the Holy Grail's Driver
first and foremost, but you are also
a salvager, are you not?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, yeah. Up until a little while ago,
that's how I made my living.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0005
rows.name:
It so happens I used to dabble in the
salvaging business a little myself back
in the day.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0006
rows.name: You were a salvager, Your Majesty?!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd had enough of the interminable
drudgery of the nobility. I decided it
was time to discover the real world.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0008
rows.name:
So I can't exactly fault Zeke for
his own actions, haha...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0009
rows.name:
I'd started salvaging on a whim. Yet
before I knew it, I was desperate to get
my hands on treasures of legend.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0010
rows.name: Cool. I'd never have guessed.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0011
rows.name:
So, did you find any legendary
treasure?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm afraid not. But I did manage to
pinpoint the location of some.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0013
rows.name:
We were working on designs for a
machine we could use to winch it up.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0014
rows.name:
But the sudden passing of my father
brought an end to all that...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0015
rows.name:
Since then, I haven't had the time for
treasure hunting, let alone salvaging.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0016
rows.name:
Oh... Um, so why are you telling
me all this?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0017
rows.name:
Because, well... Because I thought
it was about time I started enjoying
life again.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0018
rows.name:
I'd like you to retrieve the treasure
I located all those years ago for me.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0019
rows.name:
I would do it myself, but these old
bones are far past the age for
reckless gallivanting.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0020
rows.name:
If you could gather the treasure and
put it on display in this very room,
I would be truly grateful.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0021
rows.name:
Well, Your Majesty, you definitely
picked the right guy for the job.
It'd be my pleasure!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0022
rows.name: Oh, splendid!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0023
rows.name:
Then let me get to the point.
There are, in total, four treasures
I'd like for you to retrieve.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0024
rows.name:
The first is the Hammershead in
Temperantia.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0025
rows.name:
If you use the best quality cylinders in
certain weather conditions, you'll find
the treasure, I believe.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0026
rows.name:
The second, the Golden Sunstone,
lies in the Land of Mors.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0027
rows.name:
As I understand it, a salvager attempted
to retrieve it from the Cliffs of Mors,
but fumbled, and it sank deep.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0028
rows.name:
And then there's the Calamity Puzzle...
I hear a Nopon in Avaritia finally
got his little wings on it.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0029
rows.name:
So I suppose that one is less about
salvaging and more bartering.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0030
rows.name:
And finally, the Orbital Skyreader, at a
Salvage Point in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0031
rows.name:
I didn't even know there was a
Salvage Point in Elpys!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0032
rows.name: Indeed, it is not easy to spot.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0033
rows.name:
It seems like a void of nothingness,
doesn't it? But in actual fact, it adjoins
the Cloud Sea in a number of places.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0034
rows.name:
I'm certain that we'll find what we're
looking for here, but the precise spot
escapes me...

rows.label: qst105401_msg0035
rows.name:
I suppose we ought to try looking
in a few different locations!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0036
rows.name:
I'm sorry to be asking so much of you,
my boy.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0037
rows.name:
Back when I was a child, there wasn't a
salvager in Alst who didn't dream of
claiming those treasures for their own.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0038
rows.name:
Whosoever found all four would be
renowned for generations to come
as the salvager among salvagers!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0039
rows.name:
And they would have bestowed upon
them the title Salvager Supreme!

rows.label: qst105401_msg0040
rows.name:
Once you find them, I'd like you
to place them on the altars
behind me.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0041
rows.name:
Wow, altars! You've already
thought this far ahead?

rows.label: qst105401_msg0042
rows.name:
Haha... Let's just say anticipation
is a keen motivator.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0043
rows.name: Well, my boy, best of luck.

rows.label: qst105401_msg0101
rows.name:
There's something I'd like to ask Rex.
May I talk with him for a moment?
